plugin.name: jawr
plugin.title: adds Jawr (https://jawr.dev.java.net) functionality to Grails applications.
plugin.description: Jawr is a tunable packaging solution for Javascript and CSS which allows for rapid development of resources in separate module files. You can work with a large set of split javascript files in development mode, then Jawr bundles all together into one or several files in any way you define. By using a tag library, Jawr allows you to use the same, unchanged GSP pages for development and production. Jawr also minifies and compresses the files, resulting in reduced page load times.
